Sea Buckthorn - Hippophae rhamnoides (female)

USDA Hardiness: Zone 3 CHECK ZONE MAP

Sea buckthorn plants produce an extremely healthy berry and fertilize the soil that they are planted in. This makes them a must have for any permaculture garden. This female sea buckthorn should produce fruit when in the vicinity of a male. It is recommended that an orchard have no less than one male for every seven females.

Price: $13.99
